targets.expr: clamp_min(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", owner=~"$owner", role=~"$role", data_type="transactions"} - on(owner,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", owner=~"$owner", role=~"$role", storage_synchronizer_operation="synced_transactions"}, 0)
